AD_CrystalBall.synopsis: Curio item in the shop with a bit of hellish themed narrator comment. Could be made about seed of Hells floating in this ball

AD_PaintingOnDisplay1.synopsis: Curio item in the shop with a bit of hellish themed narrator comment

AD_CrystalBall_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_CrystalBall_0.text: *You see the corridors of the House of Hope. Bloated flies buzz lazily around the corpses of imps and debtors.*

AD_CrystalBall_1.speaker: Narrator
AD_CrystalBall_1.text: *Your reflection looks back at you, smiling. As the skin burns and peels from its skull, the smile grows wider and wider and wider...*

AD_CrystalBall_2.speaker: Narrator
AD_CrystalBall_2.text: *The ball shows you a vision of yourself so lewd and blasphemous that your soul feels stained.*

AD_CrystalBall_3.speaker: Narrator
AD_CrystalBall_3.text: *Within the crystal, you see the devil Raphael sipping from a goblet of blood-red wine. He smiles as he catches your eye - can he see you?*
AD_CrystalBall_3.context: NodeContext: final phrase incredulous and a little scared

AD_CrystalBall_4.speaker: Narrator
AD_CrystalBall_4.text: *The ball replays the final moments of Raphael's life over and over and over and over...*

AD_CrystalBall_5.speaker: Narrator
AD_CrystalBall_5.text: *The image within the ball drifts through the corridors of an elegant house. Corpses hang from the walls.*

AD_CrystalBall_6.speaker: Narrator
AD_CrystalBall_6.text: *With the clarity of truth, you see an image of yourself laid out on a table like a suckling pig, ready for the carving.*

AD_CrystalBall_7.speaker: Narrator
AD_CrystalBall_7.text: *Within the ball you see Raphael, broken and bloody, dangling above the maw of the archdevil Mephistopheles who is preparing to devour him.*

AD_PaintingOnDisplay4_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_PaintingOnDisplay4_0.text: *Looking at the painting makes you dizzy. You feel a dull pressure behind your eyes.*

AD_PaintingOnDisplay3_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_PaintingOnDisplay3_0.text: *The portrait's eyes seem to follow you around the room... did it just wink at you?*

AD_PaintingOnDisplay2_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_PaintingOnDisplay2_0.text: *This artwork is more foul than fine. It fills you with an uncanny sense of dread.*

AD_LabSet_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_LabSet_0.text: *A faint scent of blood clings to the alchemical apparatus. What grim purpose did it once serve?*

AD_PaintingOnDisplay1_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_PaintingOnDisplay1_0.text: *A portrait of a noble devil. Charming, sophisticated... deadly.*
